product_name: NUDESTIX Nude + Red Hot Lips 3-Piece Mini Set
user_specs: ['Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: Love the mirrored box, which is perfect for tossing in your bag and using for touch ups. I found the Royal crayon to be dry and not the right tone for my cool complexion, but the Posh gloss and Nude 04 were terrific, and I will definitely rebuy both of them when these smaller versions run out. If budget is an issue, skip the Posh gloss for a cheaper version, but get the Nude 04 crayon.

product_name: NUDESTIX Nude + Red Hot Lips 3-Piece Mini Set
user_specs: ['Age 25-34', 'Eye Color Hazel', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Normal']
review_title: Great all in one, pocket size.
review_content: I love this company. The pencils go on smooth with great definition and the gloss adds a little ump on the end. The price is good for what you get, very compact.

product_name: NUDESTIX Nude + Red Hot Lips 3-Piece Mini Set
user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: I bought this not realizing how much i truly paid for it. Colours are ok. Don't think I would buy again. Definitely not worth the money.

product_name: NUDESTIX Nude + Red Hot Lips 3-Piece Mini Set
user_specs: ['Eye Color Blue', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: Love the texture. The Nude color also works great on my cheeks!

product_name: NUDESTIX Nude + Red Hot Lips 3-Piece Mini Set
user_specs: ['Eye Color Green', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: Very drying. Both matte lip crayons were pigmented and I loved the colors BUT after about an hour, my lips were totally dried out and felt chapped. Can't wear them again.

product_name: NUDESTIX Nude + Red Hot Lips 3-Piece Mini Set
user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Medium', 'Skin Type Normal']
review_content: I have gradually been adding NudeStix to may daily makeup routine. I purchased this lip kit and love it. I would have given it 5 stars but Royal is not a color I would ever wear. I love Posh lip balm. It’s a great nude color and I really like the lip gloss too. Slightly minty tingle and great color. I’ll definitely buy the full sizes of these two. I’ll also get Nude 6 lip gloss as well.
